description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Jez Humble - Co-author of Continuous Delivery

ABSTRACT
The US Federal Government takes risk management very seriously when it comes to building and operating information systems - so seriously that there are over 4,000 pages of regulation covering it. It might seem like the modern approaches to delivering digital services proposed by the DevOps movement couldn't possibly work in this environment. [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7754

https://twitter.com/gotocph
https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference
http://gotocon.com
title: When DevOps Meets Regulation: Integrating 'Continuous' with 'Government'
